Name: Pious Courser
Story Background: Pious Courser is a humble traveler, dedicated to aiding the sick and wounded in the war-torn lands.
Ability: When Pious Courser enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Appearance Description: Pious Courser is adorned in simple white robes, carrying a staff adorned with healing runes, and is accompanied by a faithful steed.
